job.name: Linear_Regression
job.description: Linear regression is a linear approach for modeling the relationship between a scalar dependent variable y and one or more explanatory variables (or independent variables) denoted X.

task.name: Linear_Regression
task.description: N_JOBS: int The number of jobs to use for the computation. If -1 all CPUs are used. This will only provide speedup for n_targets > 1 and sufficient large problems.

script.code:
N_JOBS = variables.get("N_JOBS")
variables.put("N_JOBS_PARA", N_JOBS) variables.put("ALGORITHM_NAME", "LinearRegression") variables.put("SUPERVISED_ALGORITHM", "True") variables.put("REGRESSION_MEASURE", "True")
